errors.error: Cannot convert value of type 'String' to expected argument type 'Int'
errors.cause: Type mismatch between String and Int
errors.example:
let text = "42"
let number = Int(text) ?? 0  // Safe conversion

errors.error: Value of optional type must be unwrapped
errors.cause: Trying to use optional value without unwrapping
errors.solution: Use optional binding (if let) or nil coalescing (??)

errors.cause: Variable not declared or out of scope

errors.error: Missing return in closure expected to return
errors.cause: Closure must return value but doesn't
errors.solution: Add return statement or use implicit return

errors.error: Type of expression is ambiguous without more context
Thread 1: Fatal error: Unexpectedly found nil
errors.solution: Never use ! unless absolutely certain value exists

errors.error: Thread 1: Fatal error: Index out of range
errors.cause: Accessing array index that doesn't exist
errors.solution: Check array bounds or use safe access

errors.error: Publishing changes from background threads is not allowed

errors.solution: Check for retain cycles, use weak/unowned
Add dependency in Package.swift or project settings
Check script output, fix script errors

errors.error: Signing for requires a development team
errors.example:
// Xcode: Target > Signing & Capabilities
// Select your Apple ID team

// Check Build Phases > Copy Bundle Resources
// Remove duplicate entries
